channel.title: Peoples on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in Peoples on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Information about Places & People
item.description:
Location of lectures & lunches The location for all lectures is the Elinor Ostrom Building (Heyendaalseweg 141, 6525 AJ, Nijmegen) in room EOS 01.320. The location for all lunches is De Refter (Erasmusplein 3, 6525 HT, Nijmegen).
Instructors & Assistants Fred Hasselman My research and teaching centers on the development and application of theoretical frameworks and research methods to study of human behaviour, form the perspective of Complexity Science.
